title: Scanning QR
body: I'm scanning the qr code but it's trying to load 192.168.1.68:8080 and getting no response.

title: Failed to activate the note-book package
body:
The issue is happening when i try to open file CTRL + ALT + O

[Enter steps to reproduce below:]
1. ...
2. ...

**Atom Version**: 1.11.2
**Electron Version**: 0.37.8
**System**: Ubuntu 16.04.1
**Thrown From**: [note-book](https://github.com/AndrewAday/note-book) package, v0.1.0
### Stack Trace

Failed to activate the note-book package

```
At Cannot read property 'getPath' of undefined

TypeError: Cannot read property 'getPath' of undefined
    at Object.activate (/home/aleksandar/.atom/packages/note-book/lib/note-book.js:23:53)
    at Package.module.exports.Package.activateNow (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/src/package.js:183:20)
    at /usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/src/package.js:801:25
    at Function.module.exports.Emitter.simpleDispatch (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/node_modules/event-kit/lib/emitter.js:25:14)
    at Emitter.module.exports.Emitter.emit (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/node_modules/event-kit/lib/emitter.js:129:28)
    at CommandRegistry.module.exports.CommandRegistry.handleCommandEvent (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/src/command-registry.js:241:20)
    at /usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/src/command-registry.js:3:61
    at KeymapManager.module.exports.KeymapManager.dispatchCommandEvent (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/node_modules/atom-keymap/lib/keymap-manager.js:580:16)
    at KeymapManager.module.exports.KeymapManager.handleKeyboardEvent (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/node_modules/atom-keymap/lib/keymap-manager.js:388:22)
    at WindowEventHandler.module.exports.WindowEventHandler.handleDocumentKeyEvent (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/src/window-event-handler.js:114:36)
    at HTMLDocument.<anonymous> (/usr/share/atom/resources/app.asar/src/window-event-handler.js:3:61)
```
### Commands

```
     -0:00.1.0 note-book:toggle (div.panels-item)
```
### Config

``` json
{
  "core": {
    "automaticallyUpdate": false,
    "disabledPackages": [
      "about",
      "metrics",
      "open-on-github",
      "welcome"
    ],
    "openEmptyEditorOnStart": false,
    "projectHome": "/home/aleksandar/atom"
  }
}
```
